00035     public static class Combinatorics
00036     {
00037         #region Combinatorics: Counting
00038 
00042         public static
00043         double
00044         Variations(
00045             int n,
00046             int k
00047             )
00048         {
00049             if(k < 0 || n < 0 || k > n)
00050             {
00051                 return 0;
00052             }
00053 
00054             return Math.Floor(0.5 + Math.Exp(Fn.FactorialLn(n) - Fn.FactorialLn(n - k)));
00055         }
00056 
00060         public static
00061         double
00062         VariationsWithRepetition(
00063             int n,
00064             int k
00065             )
00066         {
00067             if(k < 0 || n < 0)
00068             {
00069                 return 0;
00070             }
00071 
00072             return Math.Pow(n, k);
00073         }
00074 
00078         public static
00079         double
00080         Combinations(
00081             int n,
00082             int k
00083             )
00084         {
00085             return Fn.BinomialCoefficient(n, k);
00086         }
00087 
00091         public static
00092         double
00093         CombinationsWithRepetition(
00094             int n,
00095             int k
00096             )
00097         {
00098             if(k < 0 || n < 0 || (n == 0 && k > 0))
00099             {
00100                 return 0;
00101             }
00102 
00103             if(n == 0 && k == 0)
00104             {
00105                 return 1;
00106             }
00107 
00108             return Math.Floor(0.5 + Math.Exp(Fn.FactorialLn(n + k - 1) - Fn.FactorialLn(k) - Fn.FactorialLn(n - 1)));
00109         }
00110 
00115         public static
00116         double
00117         Permutations(
00118             int n
00119             )
00120         {
00121             return Fn.Factorial(n);
00122         }
00123

00126         #region Combinatorics: Generate Randomly
00127 
00128         static RandomSource _random = new SystemRandomSource();
00129 
00136         public static RandomSource RandomSource
00137         {
00138             get { return _random; }
00139             set { _random = value; }
00140         }
00141 
00142         private struct IndexedValue : IComparable<IndexedValue>
00143         {
00144             internal int Index;
00145             internal double Value;
00146 
00147             public
00148             IndexedValue(
00149                 int index,
00150                 double value
00151                 )
00152             {
00153                 this.Index = index;
00154                 this.Value = value;
00155             }
00156 
00157             public
00158             int
00159             CompareTo(
00160                 IndexedValue other
00161                 )
00162             {
00163                 return this.Value.CompareTo(other.Value);
00164             }
00165         }
00166 
00169         public static
00170         int[]
00171         RandomPermutation(
00172             int n
00173             )
00174         {
00175             if(n < 0)
00176             {
00177                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("size", n, Resources.ArgumentNotNegative);
00178             }
00179 
00180             IndexedValue[] indexedValues = new IndexedValue[n];
00181             for(int i = 0; i < indexedValues.Length; i++)
00182             {
00183                 indexedValues[i] = new IndexedValue(i, _random.NextDouble());
00184             }
00185 
00186             // sorting the array (act as a random permutation)
00187             Array.Sort(indexedValues);
00188 
00189             // creating and returning the permutation
00190             int[] permutation = new int[n];
00191             for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00192             {
00193                 permutation[i] = indexedValues[i].Index;
00194             }
00195 
00196             return permutation;
00197         }
00198 
00201         public static
00202         bool[]
00203         RandomCombination(
00204             int n
00205             )
00206         {
00207             bool[] ret = new bool[n];
00208             for(int i = 0; i < ret.Length; i++)
00209             {
00210                 ret[i] = _random.NextBoolean();
00211             }
00212 
00213             return ret;
00214         }
00215 
00218         public static
00219         bool[]
00220         RandomCombination(
00221             int n,
00222             int k
00223             )
00224         {
00225             bool[] selection = new bool[n];
00226             if(k * 3 < n) 
00227             {
00228                 // just pick and try
00229                 int selectionCount = 0;
00230                 while(selectionCount < k)
00231                 {
00232                     int index = _random.Next(n);
00233                     if(!selection[index])
00234                     {
00235                         selection[index] = true;
00236                         selectionCount++;
00237                     }
00238                 }
00239 
00240                 return selection;
00241             }
00242             else 
00243             {
00244                 // based on permutation
00245                 int[] permutation = RandomPermutation(n);
00246                 for(int i = 0; i < k; i++)
00247                 {
00248                     selection[permutation[i]] = true;
00249                 }
00250 
00251                 return selection;
00252             }
00253         }
00254 
00257         public static
00258         int[]
00259         RandomCombinationWithRepetition(
00260             int n,
00261             int k
00262             )
00263         {
00264             int[] ret = new int[n];
00265             for(int i = 0; i < k; i++)
00266             {
00267                 ret[_random.Next(n)]++;
00268             }
00269 
00270             return ret;
00271         }
00272 
00275         public static
00276         int[]
00277         RandomVariation(
00278             int n,
00279             int k
00280             )
00281         {
00282             int[] selection = new int[k];
00283             int[] permutation = RandomPermutation(n);
00284             for(int i = 0; i < k; i++)
00285             {
00286                 selection[i] = permutation[i];
00287             }
00288 
00289             return selection;
00290         }
00291 
00294         public static
00295         int[]
00296         RandomVariationWithRepetition(
00297             int n,
00298             int k
00299             )
00300         {
00301             int[] ret = new int[k];
00302             for(int i = 0; i < ret.Length; i++)
00303             {
00304                 ret[i] = _random.Next(n);
00305             }
00306 
00307             return ret;
00308         }

00312         #region Combinatorics: Applied Random Generation
00313 
00324         public static
00325         void
00326         RandomShuffle<T>(
00327             IList<T> source,
00328             IList<T> target
00329             )
00330         {
00331             int len = Math.Min(source.Count, target.Count);
00332             int[] permutation = RandomPermutation(len);
00333             for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)
00334             {
00335                 target[i] = source[permutation[i]];
00336             }
00337         }
00338 
00347         public static
00348         void
00349         RandomShuffle<T>(
00350             IList<T> array
00351             )
00352         {
00353             T[] arrayCopy = new T[array.Count];
00354             array.CopyTo(arrayCopy, 0);
00355             RandomShuffle(arrayCopy, array);
00356         }
00357 
00364         public static
00365         T[]
00366         RandomSubsetVariation<T>(
00367             IList<T> array,
00368             int numberToSelect
00369             )
00370         {
00371             T[] ret = new T[numberToSelect];
00372             int[] indices = RandomVariation(array.Count, numberToSelect);
00373             for(int i = 0; i < ret.Length; i++)
00374             {
00375                 ret[i] = array[indices[i]];
00376             }
00377 
00378             return ret;
00379         }
00380 
00387         public static
00388         T[]
00389         RandomSubsetVariationWithRepetition<T>(
00390             IList<T> array,
00391             int numberToSelect
00392             )
00393         {
00394             T[] ret = new T[numberToSelect];
00395             int[] indices = RandomVariationWithRepetition(array.Count, numberToSelect);
00396             for(int i = 0; i < ret.Length; i++)
00397             {
00398                 ret[i] = array[indices[i]];
00399             }
00400 
00401             return ret;
00402         }
00403 
00410         public static
00411         T[]
00412         RandomSubsetCombination<T>(
00413             IList<T> array,
00414             int numberToSelect
00415             )
00416         {
00417             T[] ret = new T[numberToSelect];
00418             bool[] filter = RandomCombination(array.Count, numberToSelect);
00419             for(int i = 0, j = 0; i < filter.Length; i++)
00420             {
00421                 if(filter[i])
00422                 {
00423                     ret[j++] = array[i];
00424                 }
00425             }
00426 
00427             return ret;
00428         }
00429 
00436         public static
00437         T[]
00438         RandomSubsetCombinationWithRepetition<T>(
00439             IList<T> array,
00440             int numberToSelect
00441             )
00442         {
00443             T[] ret = new T[numberToSelect];
00444             int[] filter = RandomCombinationWithRepetition(array.Count, numberToSelect);
00445             for(int i = 0, j = 0; i < filter.Length; i++)
00446             {
00447                 for(int z = 0; z < filter[i]; z++)
00448                 {
00449                     ret[j++] = array[i];
00450                 }
00451             }
00452 
00453             return ret;
00454         }
